Steps.Message: Update at 20:12 - We're very sorry we've had to switch off your electricity. Our engineers have turned off the power in the Medway Street/Horseferry Road area in the interest of the public's health and safety. This is so they can investigate a serious flood which has affected our equipment. We are working with the water board and will investigate any potential damage to our equipment as soon as it is safe for us to do so. As such we're not able to give an estimated time for power to be on at the moment. We'll keep you updated.

We became aware of a power cut at 18:49. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Our engineers have turned off the power in the Medway Street/Horseferry Road area in the interest of the public's health and safety. This is so they can investigate a serious flood which has affected our equipment. We are working with the water board and will investigate any potential damage to our equipment as soon as it is safe for us to do so. As such we're not able to give an estimated time for power to be on at the moment. We'll keep you updated.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: We had to turn off power in your area so our engineers could safely carry out emergency repairs to the network.
